name: CardiacValveSurgeryICD9CM
title: Cardiac Valve Surgery ICD9CM
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a procedure of a surgery on a cardiac valve or valves.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a cardiac valve procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent cardiac valve procedures.  Codes used are to be ICD9CM codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.   Exclude codes that represent a cardiac valve surgery performed using a scope.)
